news.title: Labour drops plan to give workers protection from unfair dismissal from first day in a job
news.summary: Employees will instead get the right after six months - the promise was a key pledge in the party's manifesto ahead of last year's general election.

news.title: Households face 'dismal' rise in spending power, says IFS, as Starmer defends Budget
news.summary: Average disposable income is set to grow by "only" 0.5% annually over the next five years, the think tank says.

news.title: Chris Mason: Starmer could have scrapped child benefit cap last year - why did he wait?
news.summary: Keir Starmer has always said he wanted to end the benefit cap but the money was not available - until now.

news.title: 'Hang in there': Agonising wait for the missing after Hong Kong blaze
news.summary: Families are desperate for news of loved ones, after a huge fire engulfed seven tower blocks.

news.title: Putin doubles down on demands for Ukrainian territory ahead of talks with US in Moscow
news.summary: The Russian president accuses Kyiv of wanting to fight "to the last Ukrainian" - which he says Russia is also "in principle" ready to do.

news.title: Three arrests after BBC investigation into criminal network on High Street
news.summary: Two Iranian men and a British man are held after raids in Birmingham and the West Midlands.

news.title: Sharp fall in UK net migration with drop in arrivals for work and study
news.summary: Provisional figures for net migration to the UK show levels dropped to 204,000 in the year to June 2025.

news.title: Track the latest migration numbers - including asylum, visas and small boats
news.summary: Use our interactive tracker to explore the latest migration statistics for the UK

news.title: Ban harmful social media content instead of us, say Australian teens challenging ban
news.summary: From 10 December, social media firms must ensure Australians aged under 16 cannot have accounts.

news.title: National Guard shooting suspect worked with CIA in Afghanistan
news.summary: The suspect had been recruited to Unit 03 of the Kandahar Strike Force, a former military commander told the BBC, coming to the US after the withdrawal.
